node.title: One question everyone asks at Ghislaine Maxwell's trial may never be answered
node.alt: Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein sit in grass with a golden retriever between them
node.description: Ghislaine Maxwell’s trial has given the world a glimpse of her deeply weird and luxurious life with Jeffrey Epstein, but the mystery at the core of this saga may never be solved.
node.content:
["Did an Oxford-educated heiress enable a wealthy paedophile to systematically target and sexually abuse vulnerable young girls and women, or is Ghislaine Maxwell\u00a0being made a scapegoat?", "After a three-day adjournment, jurors\u00a0will return to the courthouse in lower Manhattan tomorrow,\u00a0as the defence gets its chance to address the\u00a0question at the heart of the former socialite's sex trafficking trial.", "Dozens of witnesses are expected to be called in an attempt to prevent\u00a0the 59-year-old daughter of publishing magnate Robert Maxwell from spending the rest of her life behind bars.", "The defence's job is to counter the narrative presented by the prosecution that, behind closed doors, the high-society heiress was a \"dangerous predator\"\u00a0who \"served up\"\u00a0young girls to try to satiate the sexual perversions of Jeffrey Epstein.", "Ms Maxwell has pleaded not guilty to six counts of enticing minors and sex trafficking over a 10-year period from 1994 to 2004.", "
A mysterious and opulent lifestyle\u00a0
", "In the trial's opening testimony, jurors were given a glimpse into a life of almost unimaginable luxury, in which Ms\u00a0Maxwell and\u00a0Epstein jetted between his Palm Beach home, a sprawling\u00a0ranch in New Mexico, a private Caribbean island and a Manhattan mansion.", "", "
Jeffrey Epstein's former employees said they often took guests to his private Caribbean island, Little Saint James.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0US Attorney's Office SDNY)
", "Guests on those flights ranged from a series of female passengers, the court heard, to the likes of former presidents Donald Trump and\u00a0Bill Clinton, actor Kevin Spacey and Prince Andrew.\u00a0", "None of Epstein's high-profile former associates, whose names have been dropped several times in court, are accused of any wrongdoing in connection with the case.", "Larry Visoski \u2014\u00a0a\u00a0long-time pilot for the secretive financier \u2014\u00a0told the court he was never aware of underage girls on board his jet and never saw any sexual activity at all.", "The court was told\u00a0that employees \u2014 such\u00a0as Mr Visoski, whose job it was to facilitate Epstein and Ms\u00a0Maxwell's lavish lifestyle \u2014\u00a0were amply rewarded.", "Mr Visoski also told the court Epstein had funded his daughters' education and gifted him land to build a home.\u00a0", "", "
Jeffrey Epstein's pilot said he never saw any illegal sexual activity on board his plane.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0US Attorney's Office SDNY)
", "While wealthy clients often expect discretion from staff, prosecutors said Ms\u00a0Maxwell created a \"culture of silence\" among employees.\u00a0", "A manual for household staff at Epstein's Palm Beach mansion commanded them to \"see nothing, hear nothing, say nothing, except to answer a question directed at you\".", "Staff were also directed to \"NEVER disclose Mr Epstein or Ms Maxwell's activities or whereabouts to anyone.\"", "At the time of the alleged crimes, Ms Maxwell was managing Epstein's properties. In Mr Visoski's words she was \"Number 2\" in the financier's hierarchy.\u00a0", "Four alleged victims have taken the stand to allege Ms Maxwell's duties also saw her recruit and groom young girls and women for sexual abuse.", "The locations vary \u2014 from New Mexico to New York, Florida and London \u2014\u00a0but the women's accounts are of a strikingly similar pattern of procurement and abuse.\u00a0", "", "
Employees of Jeffrey Epstein told the court that Ghislaine\u00a0Maxwell instituted strict rules when she moved into his Palm Beach mansion.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0US Attorney's Office SDNY)
", "The alleged modus operandi saw Ms Maxwell befriend women and girls, normalise\u00a0sexual contact and then encourage\u00a0them to give\u00a0Epstein massages which soon turned to abuse.", "Ms Maxwell, it's alleged, sometimes participated in the abuse, touching the victims' buttocks and breasts.", "The girls, often from troubled backgrounds, would regularly receive hundreds of dollars in cash afterwards.", "One alleged victim, known only as Carolyn, told the court she had more than 100 sexual encounters with Epstein at his Florida mansion, beginning when she was aged 14.", "But, she told the court, that when she reached the age of 18, she realised she was no longer as attractive to the financier.", "\"He asked me if I had any younger friends, and I said no,\" she said.", "\"That's when I realised I was too old.\"\u00a0", "
Who was Ghislaine Maxwell to Epstein?\u00a0
", "It's been an intense couple of weeks in court \u2014 from the emotional accounts of the four alleged victims, to the slightly surreal appearance of Epstein's folding massage table, dragged into the courtroom in a rare theatrical flourish by the prosecution.", "Some clues have been offered as to the nature of the relationship between Epstein and the defendant. But it, like Ms Maxwell herself, remains largely unknown.", "", "
Prosecutors claim\u00a0that Ghislaine Maxwell \"was not a particularly wealthy person when she met Epstein\" in 1991.(Supplied:\u00a0US Attorney's Office SDNY)
", "Photographs tendered in evidence suggest\u00a0that Epstein and Ms\u00a0Maxwell were in an intimate relationship over a number of years.", "They include holiday snaps where they are seen kissing, a never previously published image of a slightly dishevelled Ms Maxwell giving Epstein a foot massage on his private plane, his foot planted firmly in her cleavage.\u00a0", "One photograph of the couple shows them looking relaxed and happy at a cabin on what appears to be the Queen's Balmoral Estate in Scotland.", "", "
A photo entered into evidence shows\u00a0Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell relaxing at a\u00a0cabin on what appears to be the Queen's Balmoral Estate.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0US Attorney's Office SDNY)
", "Then there's the curious document, created in 2002 on the hard drive of a computer registered in Ms Maxwell's name, which states: \"Jeffrey and Ghislaine have been together, a couple, for the last 11 years\".\u00a0", "\"Ghislaine is highly intelligent and great company with a ready smile and an infectious laugh,\"\u00a0the document states.", "
Will Ghislaine Maxwell defend herself?\u00a0\u00a0
", "Jurors are able to watch an alert and animated Ms Maxwell in court daily, but are unlikely to be able to make a direct assessment of her intelligence or character, with most legal experts predicting she will not\u00a0take the stand.", "\"If I'm her attorney, would I want her to testify and to then be subjected to what would be excoriating cross-examination?\" asked Amos Guiora, a Professor of Law at Utah University.", "\"I think not.\"", "", "
Legal experts say it's unlikely Ghislaine Maxwell will take to the stand in her own defence.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0US Attorney's Office SDNY)
", "In cross-examination of the prosecution's witnesses, the defence has reached for a familiar playbook in historical sexual abuse cases, suggesting the women are relying on false memories.", "The alleged victims have been pressed about payouts running into the millions of dollars they received from a compensation fund set up with Epstein's estate.", "\"These are women who were manipulated by their desire for a jackpot of money,\"\u00a0defence lawyer Bobbi Sternheim said in opening arguments.", "Money has been hinted at as a possible motivating factor for Ms Maxwell, with the court shown bank statements indicating she received upwards of $42 million\u00a0from Epstein's accounts between 1999 and 2007.\u00a0", "", "
Ghislaine Maxwell has vigorously denied aiding Jeffrey Epstein's alleged crimes.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0US Attorney's Office SDNY)
", "\"These girls were just a means to support her lifestyle, a way for the defendant to make sure that Epstein, who demanded constant sexual gratification from young girls, remained satisfied,\" said prosecutor Lara Pomerantz.", "The defence is arguing that Ms Maxwell is a scapegoat who is being made to pay for Epstein's alleged crimes\u00a0because he is dead.\u00a0", "\"Ever since Eve was accused of tempting Adam with the apple, women have been blamed for the bad behaviour of men,\" Bobbi Sternheim said.\u00a0", "
Why do some women enable abusers?\u00a0
", "Whatever the outcome of this trial, those hoping for deep insights into Ms\u00a0Maxwell could be disappointed.", "Details of her\u00a0life are still so tightly held that it\u2019s not even known for certain if she was \u2014 or is \u2014 still married to another man of mystery, tech entrepreneur Scott Borgerson.", "Beyond suggestions of a financial motive, the prosecution has not delved into the psychology of Ms Maxwell's alleged criminality,\u00a0but argues the socialite was \"essential\"\u00a0to\u00a0Epstein's alleged abuse.", "The question of why a woman would allegedly\u00a0enable and participate in the abuse of other women and girls is ultimately not for the court to decide.\u00a0", "", "
Ghislaine Maxwell's defence say she is being \"scapegoated\" for crimes committed by Jeffrey Epstein because he is not able to face trial.(Supplied:\u00a0US Attorney's Office SDNY)
", "The first witness, known as Jane, said initially Ms Maxwell seemed like a big-sister figure, taking her to the movies and going shopping with her for clothes.", "Soon, though, she told the court, the older woman began talking to the 14 year-old about sex and grooming her for abuse.", "It will be up to the jury to decide whether Ms Maxwell weaponised an unspoken code that women always look out for the safety of other women.\u00a0", "The notion of women as sex predators is still in many ways a taboo, a \"topic that makes some people very uncomfortable\", said Professor\u00a0Guiora, who has written a book about enablers of abuse.", "Professor Guiora said the decision to prosecute Ms\u00a0Maxwell was therefore \"breaking important ground\".\u00a0", "", "
If found guilty, Ghislaine Maxwell faces up to 80 years in prison.(Supplied:\u00a0US Attorney's Office SDNY)
", "\"Absent the Maxwells of the world, the Epsteins of the world don't have access to victims the way that he did,\" Professor Guiora said.", "Annie Farmer, the only one of the four accusers to waive her right to anonymity, said she\u00a0accepted an invitation to Epstein's\u00a0New Mexico ranch in the hope he'd help her with her education.", "She also decided to go on the understanding Ms Maxwell, whom she took to be Epstein's girlfriend, would be there.", "The trip soon turned into a weekend of hell, she said, when Ms Maxwell gave her a massage, rubbing her breasts, and Epstein jumped into her bed for a \"cuddle\".", "\"I didn't think he would do anything like that when they were together,\" she said."]
